turn.1: What is the band Preachers Son?
turn.2: Preachers Son Preachers Son is an Irish musical group based in Dublin.
turn.4: The group is led by Irish musician Brian Hogan, and as of 2014 includes guitarist Mark Walsh and drummer Geoff French.
turn.6: Past collaborations include various notable musicians such as Gavin Friday, Liam Ó Maonlaí, Cait O'Riordan, and Kenny Wollesen.
turn.8: Preachers Son was formed in 2010 by Brian Hogan, the son of a preacher.
turn.10: He grew up listening to groups like Black Sabbath, Jimi Hendrix, Led Zeppelin, and Neil Young.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: Hogan began playing bass at the age of 12 and traveled throughout Europe playing in his father's Christian band.
